name: PEM_XS_BAT_PERF_STAT_ALL_CPU_EVENT_PL2_PECI
summary: Verify all CPU in system-wide which core base_frequency excursion occurred due to RAPL power limit 2 set via RAPL PECI interface in duration by command: perf stat -a -e pnp_excursion_monitor/$e_name,frequency_threshold=$base_freq_mhz,duration=10/ sleep 60
